resources.string: A simple application to parse latest Covid-19 live statistics from \"Our World in Data\"

Covid-19 Live Statistics (CLS) demo application is made mainly for the demonstration purpose. Hence, the ready-to-install APK binary of this application is not published anywhere. Individuals are, however, free to build and distribute the APK file, as per the regulations of GPL-v3 or any later versions, from the source code published at \'https://github.com/sunilpaulmathew/CLS\'. Alternately, you may use the attached APK file, which is directly taken from the installed location on the sender\'s device!
